topic.title: EMS Social History Section - conformance rules

section.p: Information about the patient's social environment

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11398 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.22"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10241)/@code="67843-3" EMS Social History Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Social History" (CONF:10243)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10965)
Conforms to Existence Of Drug Use Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.70:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:10967)
Conforms to Drug Use Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.71:2022-01-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10241)/@code="67843-3" EMS Social History Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Social History" (CONF:10243)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10965)
Conforms to Existence Of Drug Use Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.70:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:10967)
Conforms to Drug Use Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.71:2022-01-01)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.22" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="67843-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS Social History Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title/> <text/> </section>
